definition.procedurexml: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?><xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block deletable="false" type="event_trigger" x="395" y="184"><field name="trigger">player_right_click_block</field><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="block_is_tagged_in"><value name="a"><block type="blockstate_from_deps"/></value><value name="b"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">fallout_wastelands_:blocks_with_gui</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="entity_nbt_logic_set"><comment h="80" pinned="false" w="160">if the player opens a menu with a gui they will press E which inverts the inventory keybind, so this helps prevent this issue but does not solve it</comment><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value><value name="tagName"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">inventoryOpen</field></block></value><value name="tagValue"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">TRUE</field></block></value></block></statement></block></next></block></xml>
